Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.config.util

Class ConfigurationReader

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.config.util.ConfigurationReader
public class ConfigurationReader extends Object
This class is used to read the configurations used in the CellAmbassador. It mainly utilizes the ObjectInstantiation to read the JSON-configs and additionally sets some values used for calculation.

  • Method Details

    • importCellConfig

      public static CCell importCellConfig(String cellConfPath) throws InternalFederateException
      Read the cell configuration file.
      Parameters:
      cellConfPath - The path to a cell configuration file (as String)
      Returns:
      Returns the cell configuration that is read from the file in the path cellConfPath
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if config couldn't be read
